snippet: The Carlyle Group said on Monday that it had appointed Can Deldag and Firas Nasir as new co-heads of its operations in the Middle East and North Africa.
abstract: The Carlyle Group said on Monday that it had appointed Can Deldag and Firas Nasir as new co-heads of its operations in the Middle East and North Africa.
lead_paragraph: The private equity firm Carlyle Group said on Monday that it had appointed new co-heads of its operations in the Middle East and North Africa.

headline.main: Carlyle Appoints Co-Heads for Middle East and North Africa
